name: places/ChIJx4J7wyL2wokRFjJcaouBn8Q
formattedAddress: 73 W 108th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 73 W 108th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I am the wife of a deceased employee. My husband had an affair with one of the employees and had a baby. The company allowed my husband to receive his retirement benefits without my signature knowing that we were not together, yet we were still married until his death. The basement they allowed us to stay in has gotten an eviction order for my son to be removed from the apartment. The order states that the landlord was not aware of his death until August of 2021. He died June 2019 and the entire company attended the funeral. The Manager Robin received an email from myself in 2016 that explained my husband was trying to put me out the apartment. My husband stated since both my son and I lived there they would not evict us. This statement came when he found out he was going to succumb to Cancer in 2019. I am confused at how a company that gets housing for low income families would not try to place my son in one of their buildings. My husband’s mistress was an employee and best friends with the company’s Manager Robin. They want to destroy me but my son is the real victim, because he still lives in the apartment with his daughter. The company’s big bosses seem to have a non existent moral compass. Shame on MVMC. I guess they are still giving out apartments to their friends and family and later for other community members.

originalText.text:
Oh, may you never encounter this company. If I could give this company no stars, I would.

(Warning long comment)

I have been living in NYC my whole life, have NEVER since such dereliction of duty. This cooperation robs its tenants of their money, time, and energy. Tenants have made various complaints over the years (one tenant has a binder filled with complaint files dating back to the early 90s) and have STILL seen no changes.

In the building I currently reside, there are cockroaches all over the trash chutes, the entrance, and (for the cherry on top of this disaster) the building entrance locks are broken. Anybody could just walk in. Oh, and here's the kicker, the security cameras do not work. They are for show.

Upon walking into this building, it's palpable that this building is screaming to be taken care of. Crown molding falling off, broken tiles of the public area, the mailboxes are broken,--- Listen, I can go on for DAYS.

I don't usually make negative complaints because it's not really worth my time. But please, listen to the reviews. Please avoid coming to their properties.

To the Department of Housing in NYC, I urge you to please shut this company down.

originalText.text: Corruption is all I can say.  They hold apartments and wait until they are paid off, husband and wife team are impossible to work with. Can't get any necessary repairs done  They do not answer the phone, when I go to the office they give me an appointment to come back.  They won't even listen to what my apartment needs. Many drug dealers are moving in, they seem to be the only people willing to pay off husband/wife B to get an apartment.  Most apartments are in deplorable condition  This entire organization is a SCAM  Beware

originalText.text: They are literally allowing 20 people to live in the apartment above us. We have attempted to set up a meeting with their senior advisor and she has yet to reply back with an appointment date. This was 3 weeks ago. They get paid under table and have been accused and found guilty in the last for the same reason. They never answer he phone and are conducting illegal activities. This management company NEEDS to be shutdown and INVESTIGATED by the city ASAP!

originalText.text: To be very blunt, this establishment does little for its tenants and the community. The buildings they own is in shambles, the roofs are always leaking into peoples apartments and they do not do a very good job at following up with the community. More importantly, the people that they hire as supers are lazy and do not do their jobs. They are shady as a company and I cannot fathom why this is still around ‘til this day. Please if you are considering renting a property under these people, GO SOMEWHERE ELSE. Do not fall into the trap I have made and countless of my friends and family have made.
